channel.title: Rsbot Banned Appeals
channel.description:
Is this a good appeal? _______________________________________________________ Hey, Jagex.
I used to play runescape for 40 years straight, I never even went pee or poo or ate. And I never could seem to get past tutorial island, when you updated tutorial island, I got past it and realized that this was my life, I played for another 40 years and got to level 4 cb, then a cat flew across my refrigerator and retrieved a carrot, and that's where it all started. I joined a botting agency and bought 1000 paid bots. I spent all my money on it and they got me banned, could you please help me sue them? If you don't unban my account I wil rape mod mmg over and over again until he tells me where the cat took my carrot. It doesn't matter if I botted because I smell and noone likes me at school I wanted to poo and carrots but it never worked out with Jarrod. As you can see I am clearly innocent and I would like my account unbanned asap.
Regards, (Username).

item.title: Rsbot Banned Appeals
item.dc:creator: @Goodbye_RS_Hello_RSP Goodbye RS, Hello RSPS
item.description:
@Goodbye_RS_Hello_RSP wrote:

Hey Jagex,

It has come to my attention that I was banned. I was banned for real world trading. It’s not fair! That prostitute gave a great bj - IDC if it was a man! So give me my account back now, the prostitute wants it unbanned orelse he will tell my mom!

Best regards,
- Goodbye RS, Hello RSPS

(P.S: If you still don’t unban me I will send Michael Jackson to rape you Andrew. GF nub.)

Read full topic
